entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is a house-elf who has died and is being mourned by Harry. He is described as lying in a reddish mound of earth.

entities.name: gregorovitch
entities.description: Gregorovitch is a person who had the Elder Wand at some point in time. Harry saw Voldemort trying to find him.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is a character who tried to find Gregorovitch and steal the Elder Wand from him.

entities.name: grindelwald
entities.description: Grindelwald is a person who stole the Elder Wand from Gregorovitch.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who is accompanying him in the garden.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of Harry's friends who is accompanying him in the garden.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character who is mourning Dobby and trying to explain his theory about the Elder Wand.

relationships.description: Voldemort tried to find Gregorovitch in order to steal the Elder Wand from him.
Grindelwald stole the Elder Wand from Gregorovitch.
